subject: Relationships
title: Transparency: The Rebuilding Material
description: A short lesson to help you apply Transparency: The Rebuilding Material.

hook.text: After the betrayal, she could check his phone anytime. He offered radical transparency â€” not because she demanded it.

buildup.text: Radical transparency means proactively sharing information that the injured party needs to feel safe again.

discovery.text: It includes open communication about whereabouts, feelings, and even uncomfortable truths. No secrets, no omissions.

twist.text: Transparency has a shelf life. If it's still needed after two years, the repair may not be working.

climax.text: Transparency is the scaffolding of trust repair. Eventually it comes down â€” but only when the foundation is solid.

punchline.text: Transparency is trust's scaffolding. It holds things up while repair happens.

quiz.question: What is 'radical transparency' in trust repair?
options: Proactively sharing information the injured party needs to feel safe
